item.title: Where do i search to change what an npc says?
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

if you mean above their heads then go into NpcHandler.java and search for “moo” and you will see something liek this…

[code]if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) {
if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Moo”;
}
}[code]

so change it to suit you…

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2244) { //put you npc's id here if (misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Get your latest news here!!!!"; //put what you want them to say here } }[/code][/code]

Read full topic
